Download here

Is a helmet based on the game Dead Space. One that use the protagonist of that game.

Actually it is just a part, that you can grab with the KAS mod, and it will be positioned in the head as long you have it.

Put it outside your door, grab it when you get outside. Attach it near your door when you are done with it. If not, it will drop when you enter the vehicle.

I also suggest the use of TextureReplacer mod, or otherwise you will have two helmets on.

For the image, I edited the config file of TextureReplacer to have no helmet in 0 atmosphere. (and then I grabbed the new one)

Needs Kerbal Atachment Sistem to work properly
